key.name: server-address
key.description: Hostname or IP address where your Lyrion (LMS) is reachable.

key.name: server-port
key.description: HTTP port of the LMS web interface.

key.name: server-scheme
key.description: Either http or https depending on your server configuration.

key.name: server-username
key.description: Optional username for LMS HTTP authentication.

key.name: server-password
key.description: Optional password for LMS HTTP authentication.

key.name: player-id
key.description: The player ID reported by LMS for the client to watch.

key.name: poll-interval
key.description: How often to refresh now playing information.

key.name: shuffle-mode
key.description: Shuffle mode to use when enabling shuffle (1 = song, 2 = album).

key.name: mpris-openuri-action
key.description: What to do when a client calls OpenUri: open LMS now playing, open the provided URI, or use the provided URI with LMS fallback.

key.name: verbose-logging
key.description: Log extra details for LMS requests and MPRIS interactions.

key.name: allow-artwork-credentials
key.description: When enabled, MPRIS artwork URLs may include LMS credentials so clients can fetch protected artwork.
